title: Can't escape low priority queue?
body: For quite some time I had to play on an unreliable computer which caused many of my games to crash. Due to that I was flagged for leaving and given wait times before my matches. While I didn't feel I deserved that it's understandable so I just waited. However, after waiting I would be kicked from matchmaking and when I tried to rejoin it would reset my time. This has happened consistently after multiple uninstalls/reinstalls. Months later after finally having access to a more reliable computer I'm still getting 20 minute waits to play games. I am essentially unable to join matches as I am caught in an endless loop of waits and boots. I would love some help.

replies.body:
I don't recommend queueing up for anymore matchmade games until this gets fixed up.  I know it's not your intent, but [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) treats everyone equally because leaves still causes others a negative experience.  It sounds like your issue may not be with game files, but a connection problem causing you to lose comms with our services.

You should start out with the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help troubleshoot, but again you'll want to do this in a custom.
